nodes.text: The Maledoth was a former Yuuzhan Vong slaveship used in the Ramoan relocation project by the Jedi. According to Corran Horn, the Jedi in control of the project was the Wookiee Lowbacca; when he left for the Unknown Regions the project came to a standstill because no others possessed his understanding of Yuuzhan Vong biotechnology.
